sqlMap.statement: SELECT PRC_LIST_EQUIP_PRC_AMT FROM PRC_LIST_EQUIP PLE WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRC_CATG_CD = #prcCatgCd# AND CASE WHEN PRC_QLFY_TP_CD = #prcQlfyTpCd01# AND PRC_QLFY_VAL_TXT IN (#mdseCd#, #ordTakeMdse#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END = 1 AND PKG_UOM_CD = #pkgUomCd# AND PRC_FMLA_PK IS NULL AND PRC_LIST_EQUIP_CONFIG_NUM IS NULL AND DEL_FLG = #delFlg# AND EFF_FROM_DT <= #prcBaseDt# AND (EFF_THRU_DT >= #prcBaseDt# OR EFF_THRU_DT IS NULL) ORDER BY PRC_LIST_EQUIP_PK

SELECT PRC_LIST_EQUIP_PRC_AMT FROM PRC_LIST_EQUIP PLE WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PRC_CATG_CD = #prcCatgCd# AND CASE WHEN PRC_QLFY_TP_CD = #prcQlfyTpCd01# AND PRC_QLFY_VAL_TXT IN (#mdseCd#, #ordTakeMdse#) THEN 1 WHEN PRC_QLFY_TP_CD = #prcQlfyTpCd02# AND PRC_QLFY_VAL_TXT = #coaMdseTpCd# THEN 1 WHEN PRC_QLFY_TP_CD = #prcQlfyTpCd03# AND PRC_QLFY_VAL_TXT = #firstProdCtrlCd# THEN 1 WHEN PRC_QLFY_TP_CD = #prcQlfyTpCd04# AND PRC_QLFY_VAL_TXT = #scdProdCtrlCd# THEN 1 WHEN PRC_QLFY_TP_CD = #prcQlfyTpCd05# AND PRC_QLFY_VAL_TXT = #thirdProdCtrlCd# THEN 1 WHEN PRC_QLFY_TP_CD = #prcQlfyTpCd06# AND PRC_QLFY_VAL_TXT = #frthProdCtrlCd# THEN 1 WHEN PRC_QLFY_TP_CD = #prcQlfyTpCd07# AND PRC_QLFY_VAL_TXT = #fifthProdCtrlCd# THEN 1 ELSE 0 END = 1 AND PKG_UOM_CD = #pkgUomCd# AND PRC_FMLA_PK IS NULL AND PRC_LIST_EQUIP_CONFIG_NUM IS NULL AND DEL_FLG = #delFlg# AND EFF_FROM_DT <= #prcBaseDt# AND (EFF_THRU_DT >= #prcBaseDt# OR EFF_THRU_DT IS NULL) ORDER BY PRC_LIST_EQUIP_PK
